attributes.action: End The Game Once And For All
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As you may be aware, there is a game that has swept the nation. to think of the game is to lose the game, and the fustrating results of this can be seen countrywide. The only way the game can end is for the current UK Prime Minister to announce on live TV, that the game is over. So please, sign up for this petition, and end the game once and for all!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
